charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1101_0100_20:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] traveled
deep into the glaciers.
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1101_0200_20:
Instead of the solitary scene [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he’d" F="she’d" ] expected, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ]
came across three people talking happily.
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_0300_10:
I can see why you and Articuno were chosen to
be Neo Champions of Pasio!
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_0400_10:
Those Ice-type moves were impressive even
to me!
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_0500_10:
Your average Trainer would be so entranced by
the beauty of the ice, they’d be frozen solid before
they snapped out of it!
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_0600_10:
Yeah, it’s not just strong. The way it moves as it
fights—almost like it’s dancing—is sure to charm
anyone who sees it.
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_0401_0800_10:
Wow, I’m surprised to see you all the way out
here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_0402_1000_10:
Oh, hey, it’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’m surprised to see you all the way out here!
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_1200_10:
But at any rate, Red... Where did you catch
Articuno, anyway?
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_1300_10:
I’m pretty sure I heard that they met at the
Seafoam Islands.
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_1400_10:
Although Red had seen Articuno before actually
coming face-to-face with it, and had been
running around searching for it for ages.
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_1500_10:
I think you saw it through some binoculars at the
gate by Fuchsia City, right?
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_1700_10:
Well, the caverns underneath the Seafoam Islands
are certainly very cold.
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_1800_10:
A lot of very powerful Ice-type Pokémon make
their homes there.
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_1900_10:
Not many Trainers venture there either, so I
suppose it was a pretty comfortable place
for Articuno.
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_2000_10:
But to think Articuno was so close to me... I sure
missed out!
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_2100_10:
Well, Articuno still took a long time to warm up to
Red, even after it was caught. It is a Legendary
Pokémon, after all.
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_2600_10:
Clearly it takes a legendary Trainer to be
recognized by a legendary bird Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_2700_10: After all, he’s a “living legend”! Haha!
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_2800_10:
And I’m sure he’ll keep showing us battles that live
up to that reputation!
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_2900_10:
Of course...Red’s not the only Trainer who’s been
recognized by a legendary bird Pokémon,
you know.
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_3100_10:
You two really are ALWAYS competing with each
other, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0000_90_red/2301_1201_3300_10:
If we weren’t, none of this would feel worth as
much to Red or Articuno, would it?
